about_the_game:
Staff List

CV: Yohei Azakami as Ningen-sama
　　 Ai Kakuma as Tsubame
production : PECOLIEN
Scenario : Kuro Shirayuki
Character Design : Yu Kisaragi
Music: Asano Hayato
Background: Weisschu
Programming: Yuuki Miyamori
Title logo: KOMEWORKS

Synopsis

.Hundreds of years after a massive war has destroyed human civilization.
A young man, rational and cold-blooded because he has lived on the battlefield since childhood, is attacked and injured by bandits.

Injured, he takes refuge in a nearby abandoned shelter.
There he meets someone. It is a young girl, a babysitter android manufactured in the olden days.
The girl's forceful meddling wins him over, and he begins to live with her until his injuries are healed.

A funny and moving story about an android girl who is more human than human and a human who has forgotten her human heart.

About the work

.The concept of this work is “to be able to finish the book in a short time, and to feel a good sense of satisfaction as if you had watched a movie.

The concept is simple and gorgeous: one heroine, one ending, no choices, and full voice including the main character.
You can enjoy the game stress-free until the end without getting stuck in the story.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain extreme depictions of blood, violence, etc.
